en-US.gameTitle: Drunk Dragon vs. the Drag Queens
en-US.introStory1: It is the year 1986. While our nights were filled with fun and excitement, our land is in great turmoil, for the hedonistic days of the Queens are endangered by the coming of the Drunk Dragon.
en-US.introStory2: A fiend so foul, his stench is only outmatched by his drinking problem. Nobody is sure from whence he came but everybody agrees it'd sure'd be great if he disappeared again.
en-US.introStory3: This storyline might be wafer thin, but then again anything is compared to the layers of cake on your face.
